section.title: Terminology and notation
section.p: We'll repeat the definition of similar matrices here so that we can attach some notation to the notion, and then we'll add a definition related to .

li.title: similar matrices
li.p: a pair of square matrices A and B for which there exists an invertible matrix P satisfying B=\inv{P}AP; we will write B \similar A to indicate this relationship

li.title: similarity class
li.p: the subset of \matrixring_n(\C) consisting of all matrices that are similar to a particular matrix
